div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 79. South wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am. Cloudy, then gradual clearing toward daybreak, with a low around 46. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming light and variable. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 85. Northwest wind around 5 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon.

a.aria-label: Read more about Buildings Closed through May 1 but EDUCATION WILL CONTINUE

span.span: THIS FORM MUST BE SUBMITTED NO LATER THAN 9:00 AM EACH DAY UNLESS YOU SIGN UP FOR THE WEEKS MEALS.

This form is to help us identify how many breakfast/lunches are needed. This is for anyone from the age of 1-18 years old. The lunch delivery each day will come with the next days breakfast. Please list out each students name, pickup location of your meals and whether you wish for a meal that day or for the whole week. All meals will be at the delivery point from 11:30am-12:30pm each day. If you have already called the school to submit your count then there is no need to submit this form.
If you have any questions please call
